scripts.build: cd contract && npm run build && mkdir -p ../out && rm -f ./out/hello_near.wasm && cp ./build/release/hello_near.wasm ../out/main.wasm
scripts.start: npm run deploy && echo The app is starting! && env-cmd -f ./neardev/dev-account.env parcel frontend/index.html --open
scripts.clean-start: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm --prefix ./frontend install ./frontend && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react* && npm start --reset-cache
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: cd contract && npm i && npm run test
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:ts && npm run test:integration:rs
